title: Complex Addition Function
description: This function takes two complex numbers as input and returns their sum as a complex number. The operation is performed by adding the real parts and the imaginary parts of the input complex numbers separately.
name: CADD

input.name: X
input.description: The first complex number to be added.

input.name: Y
input.description: The second complex number to be added.

return_value.description: The resulting complex number obtained from the addition of X and Y.

fields.name: re
fields.description: The real part of the resulting complex number.

fields.name: im
fields.description: The imaginary part of the resulting complex number.
